experience.title: Software Engineer at Shopee
content: Working on the Shopee Android App :)

experience.title: Software Engineer at Khosla Labs
content: Worked in a team to develop a physical identity document scanner which classifies if the correct document is being scanned and extracts the person's details (key-value pairs) from the document by running OCR on the document image and later parsing it.

Lead the development of a challenge based selfie capturer which captures the selfie of a person while ensuring that the person is live by asking the person to perform random challenges like blink eyes, turn face left, turn face right.

Lead the development of a multi-module, code pluggable, JSON driven workflow framework to render dynamic Android screen flows to meet varying requirements of around 200 B2B clients. Worked with Dagger-2, RxJava, OkHttp, Retrofit, Espresso while using MVP pattern and SOLID principles.
Handled technical queries and provided on-site technical/integration support for the products I was involved in.

Worked in a team handling a set of multi-tenant microservices using MySQL. Develop new microservices, enhanced database schemas to accommodate new use cases and built RESTful APIs, and CRON jobs in fairly complex modules like subscription and billing.

experience.title: Teaching Assistant at IIT Mandi
content: I was a teaching assistant in course Software Design Patterns under professor Bansidhar Choudhary.
My work was to design assignments and projects along with the professor and evaluate the submissions, observe, and suggest improvements in the course content and structure.

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern at Khosla Labs
content: Improved performance, UI, UX and added new features to an Android App.

experience.title: Android & Web Intern at Spiderz Lab
content: Developed Android Apps using Android Studio, Parse Android API, Google Maps API, Google Location Services API, Google Geocoder API.
Developed a Website using JavaScript, Parse JS API, Google Maps Embed API.

madeWith: Made with Kotlin Multiplatform, Jetpack Compose & Swift UI
